document_name: Government Regulation of the Republic of Indonesia No MOR 71 of 2014 concerning Protection and Management of Peat Ecosystems
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/IDN/2014/IDN-2014-01-01-Government Regulation of the Republic of Indonesia No MOR 71 of 2014 concerning Protection and Management of Peat Ecosystems_3301fc66a16f2821b901e5a2f5b4f8a1.pdf
document_description: This Government Regulation, issued under Law 32/2009 on Environmental Protection and Management, makes provision for the protection and management of peatland ecosystems and sets out rules and regulations for monitoring and compliance.
